text: Postponed by almost 2 years trip to the paradise-like island with amazing nature and traces of old civilization. This trip was planned for early 2020 but then covid-19 happenedâ€¦

title: Dubai
text:
Our path included a plane transfer in the United Arab Emirates. Dubai is a pretty modern city in the desert with many interesting places.
It looks really rich everywhere and the metro without a driver that goes above the ground helps have a quick look at the city.

title: Intro
text: Sri Lanka (formerly known as Ceylon) is a fascinating destination for all kinds of tourists. You can try local cuisine, surfing and hiking, find the traces of old cities or enjoy rich nature with animals variety.
